speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report by Alexander Radwan, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) and the Governance of the International Accounting Standards Board (IASB) ( 2006/2248(INI) ) ( A6-0032/2008 ).

agenda_item: International Financial Reporting Standards and the governance of the International Accounting Standards Board (debate)
